- Select an option in the dialog

The currency used in Money Cradle can be changed in the Settings by specifying your country and the currency in the Locale section.

Your full version free trial period has expired. Some accounts will be closed (available in the Closed Accounts section) which can be reopened after unlocking all features

Go to the Store section in the side menu to unlock features.
How do I change currency used?
An Account type is a form in which an account holds monetary value. It could be cash, bank, asset, or liability.
A payee can be an individual, a company or anything to which money is paid or received from.

An account as used in Money Cradle is any compartment which holds financial value. This could be bank accounts, credit card accounts, debtors, money in cash or in wallet, a piggy bank, a box which you named emergency money etc.

Generally anything as long as it has monetary value attached to it.

Money Cradle is a world class finance manager that helps you to have a better grip on your financial wellbeing. This app was designed to suit the needs of many who are interested in keeping their money matters in check even without necessarily having advanced accounting skills. Therefore it is easy to use and gives you the results you want making it a world leader.

With Money Cradle, you are able to open your different financial accounts, track your income and expenses, and view chart reports about your financial performance. Additionally, you can schedule future transactions to suit your needs, start and monitor the performance of your projects, and follow up your transactions according to specific categories and payees.

Developed by: Eric Senyonga

Current Version: 1.3.0

Libraries and Resources used;

* AchartEngine for graphs and charts Link

* Icons8 for some icons Link

* Android developersLink

* AppRaterLink

Return to the previous screen by touching the Back button.

Money Cradle comes fully packed with other useful features on top of the basics. These can be found in the side menu by tapping the three horizontal bars next to the app icon.

Scheduled

As we carry on with our daily lives there are some things we begin to do as routine. This feature is included to help you reduce the work you have to do by entering future transactions. These transactions can be set to occur once, daily, weekly, monthly or annualy. An example of a recurring transaction could be receiving your salary.

To add a new Scheduled transaction, tap the + in the top right corner of the screen. This will open a screen where you can fill in the appropriate details.

Projects

This feature helps you monitor the financial performance and progress of your projects. These projects could be anything that you are involved in like a new business venture, a charity cause etc.

To add a new project, tap the + in the top right corner of the Projects screen. To begin tracking project transactions make sure you select the appropriate project while entering a new transaction.

Backup and Restore Database

Money Cradle gives you the ability to backup your database and restore it at a later date. This can be found in the menu of the Home screen

Charts and Reports

This feature helps you to have a graphical view of your financial health. The charts are easy to read and understand. These can be found in the Reports tab of the Home Screen

Export to Spreadsheet

With this feature, you can export all your transactions to a spreadsheet in CSV format which can be viewed on your laptop or computer. The exported reports can be found in the Spreadsheet Reports folder in your Money Cradle folder.

This can be accessed in the Reports tab of the Home Screen

Categories and Payees

Money Cradle gives you the ability to view transactions within a specific category or by a specific payee. You can also add your own categories by tapping the + in the top right corner of the Categories screen.

Daily Reminder

To keep you on top of your finances, Money Cradle has a feature to remind you daily to enter your transactions. This feature can be found in the Settings

Money Cradle has different interactive screens for your easy navigation:

The Home Screen

Accounts tab

The Accounts tab shows a list of all your open financial accounts. The list is detailed with the name of each account, the account type and the current account balance.

Adding an account

To add an account, tap the +a icon in the top right of the action bar. This will open a screen for you to fill in the account details.

History tab

The History tab shows a detailed list of all your transactions. The details include the date of the transaction, the payee, the category and the account involved plus the trasnsaction amount.

Adding a new transaction

To add a new transaction, tap the +t icon in the top right of the action bar. This will open a screen for you to fill in the transaction details.

Alternatively, you can tap on any account in the Accounts tab and select New Transaction in the dialog

Reports tab

The Reports tab shows a list of different chart options that you can use to get a graphical view of your financial performance.

Return to the previous screen by touching the Back button.
Include transactions from this account in totals

Version 1.3.0

- Updated to support Android 5.1.1

- Fixed bug with Upgrade process

- Multiple performance improvements

Version 1.2.0

- Updated to support Lollipop devices

- Added some material design features

- Multiple bug fixes and performance improvements

Version 1.1.1

- Added function to Export transactions to SpreadSheet in Reports Tab

- Crash fixes on some devices

Version 1.1

- Added What\'s new in Help

- Added feature to add your own currency in Settings

- Fixed \'Unexpected close\' bug on some devices when opening app

- Fixed \'Unexpected close\' bug on some devices when trying to open the Settings screen

- Changed \'Send feedback\' to \'Make a suggestion\' in side menu

Version 1.0

First version of the app
